required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Sintilimab in Combination With R-CHOP in Patients With Treatment-naive EBV-positive DLBCL, NOS
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase II, Prospective, Multi-center Study of Sintilimab in Combination With R-CHOP in Patients With Treatment-naive EBV-positive DLBCL, NOS

lead_sponsor.agency: The First Affiliated Hospital with Nanjing Medical University

clinical_study.source: The First Affiliated Hospital with Nanjing Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: The prognosis of EBV+ DLBCL is dismal. Previous study showed that high level of PD-L1 expression in EBV+ DLBCL. The investigators therefore design this phase II study to investigate the safety and efficacy of sintilimab (an anti-PD-1 antibody) in combination with R-CHOP in patients with treatment-naive EBV+ DLBCL.

primary_outcome.description: from date of inclusion to date of progression, relapse, or death from any cause

secondary_outcome.description: overall response rate after treated by Sintilimab and R-CHOP
from the date of inclusion to date of death, irrespective of cause

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of treatment related adverse events as assessed by NCI-CTCAE 5.0

overall_official.affiliation: The first Affiliated Hospital Of Nanjing Medical University(JiangSu Province Hospital)

facility.name: The first Affiliated Hospital Of Nanjing Medical University(JiangSu Province Hospital)

The Second Affiliated Hospital Of Suzhou University
